text: Luqman Ismail is a Singaporean footballer who plays for Home United FC as a Defender. He started playing in the Sleague for Home United http://www.espnfc.com/singapore-s-league/story/2790385/jumaat-jantan-primed- for-14th-sleague-season-at-home in 2015 after the coach then promoted him to the squad. ==Club career== ===Home United=== He started playing for the Protectors in 2014 in their prime league team. He started his senior team stint with Home United in 2015 and was extended for 2016. ==International career== He was called up by the FAS to play in the Vietnam Youth Newspaper Cup 2015. == Career statistics == {| style="text-align:center" class="wikitable" ! rowspan="2" |Club ! rowspan="2" |Season ! colspan="2" |S.League ! colspan="2" |Singapore Cup ! colspan="2" |Singapore League Cup ! colspan="2" |Asia ! colspan="2" |Total |- !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- | rowspan="5" |Home United |2015 |0 |0 |0 |0 |0 |0 | colspan="2" |— |0 |0 |- |2016 |0 |0 |0 |0 |0 |0 | colspan="2" |— |0 |0 |- |2017 |1 |0 |0 |0 |0 |0 | colspan="2" |— |1 |0 |- |} ==References== Category:Singaporean footballers Category:Singapore Premier League players Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:Home United FC players
